name: Midnight Jerk
description:
Our submission to the Manasoup Game Jam 2 of 2022.

Description:

This game is all about the moment everyone has at least experienced once: we call it the midnight jerk. Even though some people, especially men, will misunderstand, the late night jerk describes a person jerking and waking up from it after they hit the ground from freefalling in their dreams.

Controls:

Play:                  Space

Movement:   WASD

Camera:          Mouse or Arrowkeys
